entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 8.4°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
